name: Cave Runner
description: It's not just "another game," it's a challenge, and I'm throwing it to you!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Celeron Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GeForce 240 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core I5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GeForce 980 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 300 MB available space
